entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Kluane Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:08 AM MST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, -9.4°C

entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 10.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 10. Wind chill near minus 21. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Low minus 15 with temperature rising to minus 12 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning this evening. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light late this evening. Low minus 15 with temperature rising to minus 12 by morning. Wind chill minus 22 this evening. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Thursday 23 February 2023
